name: Sugar Fever (Cain Sanches)
description:
This game was submitted as an entre for the Ludum Dare 49, the theme was "Unstable"

Intro:

After a radioactive sugar cube from space colide in our beloved planet, everything  become unstable and turn into candy ! 

You need to run for your life and dodge all the obstacles made out of sweet sweet sugar or you too will turn... into a Gummy Bear !

Gameplay:

Use left/right key to run and SpaceBar to jump

Artwork by: @cainsanches

Our first game made in: 69 hours

We are really proud of ourselves and hope you all enjoy this little prototype :)
